import React from 'react' import close from '../../images/close.png' import styled from 'styled-components' import './style.scss' const Img = styled.img` ` const Modal = (props) => { const {setShow, dataBooks} = props const {categories, title, authors, description, infoLink} = dataBooks?.volumeInfo const {thumbnail} = dataBooks?.volumeInfo?.imageLinks const onClickShow = () => { setShow(false) } return(

{categories}

) } export default Modal
